DOC.brief_summary: This is a research study of persons with Down Syndrome between 2 and 80 years old who are independently walking. The purpose of this study is to see what effect orthotics have on how people with Down Syndrome walk.
DOC.brief_title: Gait Parameters of Persons With Down Syndrome With and Without Orthotics Using GaitRite
DOC.criteria: Down Syndrome, independent walkers Down Syndrome, not independently walking
